forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 39F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely, especially in the morning. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely, especially in the morning. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low near 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 24C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 76F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 24C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 76F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 70F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
